dcterms:description: JAAD is a richly annotated dataset composed of 348 short video clips. It includes a diverse number of road actors for each scene and several driving locations, traffic and weather conditions. The datasetâ€™s annotations are divided by spatial, behavioral, contextual, and pedestrian information.
dcterms:title: JAAD Dataset

dcterms:creator: Amir Rasouli
Iuliia Kotseruba
John K Tsotsos
dcterms:description: PIE contains over 300K labeled video frames recorded in Toronto in clear weather. It incorporates ego-vehicle information derived from on-board diagnostics (OBD) sensors and provides annotations for all pedestrians in close proximity to the road, irrespective of whether they attempt to cross.
dcterms:title: PIE Dataset
